Browse Options:Pattern Label Property

Short Name: PttnLabel

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Path Properties

To Use: Create a property.

Label to display in the file dialog box next to the custom pattern. Use the Browse Options:Match Pattern property to set a custom pattern.

This property is similar to the pattern label parameter in the File Dialog Express VI and the Pattern Label option on the Browse Options page of the Path Properties dialog box.

This property is an element of the Browse Options property.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
PermissionsRead/Write
Available in Run-Time EngineYes
Available in Real-Time Operating SystemYes
Settable when the VI is runningYes
Loads the front panel into memoryNo
Need to authenticate before useNo
Loads the block diagram into memoryNo
Remote access allowedYes
